name: atlascode
description: Bringing the power of Jira and Bitbucket to VS Code - With Atlassian for VS Code you can create and view issues, start work on issues, create pull requests, do code reviews, start builds, get build statuses and more!

scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run compile:react && npm run compile:extension
scripts.test:
rm -rf coverage && npm run test:unit && npm run test:react && istanbul-merge --out coverage/coverage-final.json coverage/react/coverage-final.json coverage/unit/coverage-final.json && echo '

Total test coverage:' && nyc report --reporter clover --reporter lcov --reporter html --reporter text-summary -t coverage/ --report-dir coverage/
scripts.test:e2e: echo 'token length' && echo ${#ATLASCODE_TEST_USER_API_TOKEN} && npm run test:e2e:compile && e2e/scripts/run
scripts.mui:atlascodeSettings:dark: cross-env PAGETSX="config/ConfigPage.tsx" VIEW="atlascodeSettingsV2" THEME="dark" webpack-dev-server --open --config webpack.mui.webview.js
scripts.mui:atlascodeSettings:light: cross-env PAGETSX="config/ConfigPage.tsx" VIEW="atlascodeSettingsV2" THEME="light" webpack-dev-server --open --config webpack.mui.webview.js
scripts.mui:atlascodeOnboarding:dark: cross-env PAGETSX="onboarding/OnboardingPage.tsx" VIEW="atlascodeOnboardingV2" THEME="dark" webpack-dev-server --open --config webpack.mui.webview.js
scripts.mui:atlascodeOnboarding:light: cross-env PAGETSX="onboarding/OnboardingPage.tsx" VIEW="atlascodeOnboardingV2" THEME="light" webpack-dev-server --open --config webpack.mui.webview.js
scripts.mui:bitbucketIssuePage:light: cross-env PAGETSX="bbissue/BitbucketIssuePage.tsx" VIEW="bitbucketIssuePageV2" THEME="light" webpack-dev-server --open --config webpack.mui.webview.js
scripts.mui:bitbucketIssuePage:dark: cross-env PAGETSX="bbissue/BitbucketIssuePage.tsx" VIEW="bitbucketIssuePageV2" THEME="dark" webpack-dev-server --open --config webpack.mui.webview.js
scripts.mui:welcomePage:light: cross-env  PAGETSX="welcome/Welcome.tsx" VIEW="welcomePageV2" THEME="light" webpack-dev-server --open --config webpack.mui.webview.js
scripts.mui:startWorkPage:dark: cross-env PAGETSX="startwork/StartWorkPage.tsx" VIEW="startWorkPageV2" THEME="dark" webpack-dev-server --open --config webpack.mui.webview.js
scripts.mui:startWorkPage:light: cross-env PAGETSX="startwork/StartWorkPage.tsx" VIEW="startWorkPageV2" THEME="light" webpack-dev-server --open --config webpack.mui.webview.js
scripts.mui:createJiraIssue:dark: cross-env PAGETSX="issue/CreateJiraIssuePage.tsx" VIEW="createIssueScreenV2" THEME="dark" webpack-dev-server --open --config webpack.mui.webview.js
scripts.mui:createJiraIssue:light: cross-env PAGETSX="issue/CreateJiraIssuePage.tsx" VIEW="createIssueScreenV2" THEME="light" webpack-dev-server --open --config webpack.mui.webview.js
scripts.webview:viewJiraIssue:dark: cross-env PAGETSX="issue/JiraIssuePage.tsx" VIEW="viewIssueScreen" THEME="dark" webpack-dev-server --open --config webpack.react.webview.js
scripts.webview:viewJiraIssue:light: cross-env PAGETSX="issue/JiraIssuePage.tsx" VIEW="viewIssueScreen" THEME="light" webpack-dev-server --open --config webpack.react.webview.js
scripts.webview:viewPullRequestScreen:dark: cross-env PAGETSX="pullrequest/PullRequestPage.tsx" VIEW="pullRequestDetailsScreen" THEME="dark" webpack-dev-server --open --config webpack.react.webview.js
scripts.webview:viewPullRequestScreen:light: cross-env PAGETSX="pullrequest/PullRequestPage.tsx" VIEW="pullRequestDetailsScreen" THEME="light" webpack-dev-server --open --config webpack.react.webview.js

commands.title: Copy Pull Request Url to Clipboard

atlascode.outputLevel.description: Specifies how much (if any) output will be sent to the Atlassian output channel

atlascode.configurationTarget.description: Location to which configuration changes are saved

atlascode.enableCurlLogging.description: Enables logging the cUrl commands used by the extension

atlascode.enableHttpsTunnel.description: Enables tunneling https requests to an http proxy

atlascode.enableCharles.description: Enables proxying requests through the Charles Web Debugger when debugging

atlascode.charlesCertPath.description: The absolute path to the generated charles ssl certificate (pem file)

atlascode.charlesDebugOnly.description: Enables charles *only* when debugging the extension (for internal use)

atlascode.enableUIWS.description: Enables UI websocket for debugging webviews

atlascode.showWelcomeOnInstall.description: Enables showing the welcome screen when a new version is installed

atlascode.onlineCheckerUrls.description: Online Checker will ping these URLs to determine online status

atlascode.jira.startWorkBranchTemplate.c.description: The format which will be used to auto-generate branch names
Custom prefixes for branch names on start work screen

atlascode.jira.showCreateIssueProblems.description: Show a link to view non-renderable fields on Jira create issue page

atlascode.jira.explorer.showOpenIssues.description: Enables the Open Issues in the Jira Issue Explorer

atlascode.jira.explorer.openIssueJql.default: assignee in (EMPTY) and project=currentProject() and resolution = Unresolved and statusCategory != Done order by lastViewed DESC

atlascode.jira.explorer.showAssignedIssu.description: Enables the Assigned Issues in the Jira Issue Explorer

atlascode.jira.explorer.assignedIssueJql.default: assignee=currentUser() and project=currentProject() and resolution = Unresolved and statusCategory != Done
atlascode.jira.explorer.assignedIssueJql.description: JQL to retrieve issues assigned to you

atlascode.jira.explorer.monitorEnabled.description: Show notifications when new issues are created for default site and project

atlascode.jira.explorer.refreshInterval.description: Time (in minutes) to wait before refreshing the Jira Issue Explorer (set to 0 to disable auto-refresh)

atlascode.jira.explorer.nestSubtasks.description: Nest subtasks within tasks within epics

atlascode.jira.explorer.fetchAllQueryRes.description: Fetch all results for JQL queries

atlascode.jira.statusbar.showProduct.description: Shows the product name in the status bar

atlascode.jira.statusbar.showUser.description: Shows the user's name in the status bar

atlascode.jira.statusbar.showLogin.description: Shows a login button in the status bar

atlascode.jira.statusbar.showActiveIssue.description: Shows active Jira issue key in the status bar

atlascode.jira.lastCreateSiteAndProject.description: the last used site id and project key for create issue

atlascode.jira.jqlList.description: The list of JQL queries that populate the issue list view

atlascode.jira.todoIssues.enabled.description: Enables the create of Jira issues from TODO comments and similar

atlascode.jira.todoIssues.triggers.description: Strings that will trigger the Jira issue create Code Lens

atlascode.bitbucket.preferredRemotes.description: The first remote that matches the list will be used to fetch pull requests, issues, and pipelines. A random remote is chosen if a match is not found.

atlascode.bitbucket.explorer.enabled.description: Enables the Bitbucket Pull Request Explorer

atlascode.bitbucket.explorer.repositoryB.description: Enable repository based pull requests tree view

atlascode.bitbucket.explorer.pullRequest.description: Enable pull requests overview tree view

atlascode.bitbucket.explorer.nestFilesEn.description: Enables nesting of the PR files by folder

atlascode.bitbucket.pipelines.monitorEna.description: Show notifications for new Bitbucket Pipelines build statuses

atlascode.bitbucket.pipelines.refreshInt.description: Time (in minutes) to wait before refreshing the Pipelines status

atlascode.bitbucket.pipelines.hideEmpty.description: Hide Bitbucket Pipelines that have no results

atlascode.bitbucket.pipelines.hideFilter.description: Hide Bitbucket Pipelines that don't match a filter string

atlascode.bitbucket.pipelines.branchFilt.description: Bitbucket Pipeline results for branch names that don't contain one of these strings will be hidden.

atlascode.bitbucket.issues.createJiraEna.description: Shows a create jira issue button on the Bitbucket issue screen

atlascode.bitbucket.issues.monitorEnable.description: Show notifications when new Bitbucket Issues are created

atlascode.bitbucket.issues.refreshInterv.description: Time (in minutes) to wait before refreshing the Bitbucket Issues

atlascode.bitbucket.explorer.refreshInte.description: Time (in minutes) to wait before refreshing the pull requests explorer (set to 0 to disable auto-refresh)

atlascode.bitbucket.explorer.relatedJira.description: Show related Jira issues for Bitbucket pull requests

atlascode.bitbucket.explorer.relatedBitb.description: Show related Bitbucket issues for Bitbucket pull requests

atlascode.bitbucket.explorer.notificatio.description: Show notifications when new pull requests are created

atlascode.bitbucket.explorer.showReviewe.description: Show pull requests that you have already left a review on when showing pull requests to be reviewed

enumDescriptions: Show pull requests created by me.
Show pull requests to be reviewed.
atlascode.bitbucket.explorer.defaultPull.description: The default filter to use in the pull request explorer

atlascode.bitbucket.contextMenus.enabled.description: Enables Bitbucket context menu items in editor

atlascode.bitbucket.statusbar.showProduc.description: Shows the product name in the status bar

atlascode.bitbucket.statusbar.showUser.description: Shows the user's name in the status bar

atlascode.bitbucket.statusbar.showLogin.description: Shows a login button in the status bar
